faq_page.subtitle: Common Questions About Our Services
faq_page.intro: Find answers to the most common questions about IA7 Global Tech's services, processes, and how we work with our clients and technical partners.
faq_page.contact_text: If you have additional questions or need more information about our services, please don't hesitate to reach out to our team.

items.question: Do you do all the development work in-house?
items.answer: No. IA7 Global Tech acts as your single point of contact. The technical work is performed by experienced external specialists, coordinated and managed by IA7 Global Tech to ensure high quality.

items.question: Where are your technical teams located?
items.answer: Technical services may be provided by partners outside the EU, under strict data protection and quality standards. IA7 Global Tech remains your contractual partner.

items.question: How do you handle my personal or business data?
items.answer: Your data is handled according to our Privacy Policy, GDPR-compliant, including any transfers to non-EU partners.

items.question: How can I request changes to my project?
items.answer: Project modifications can be requested at any time. IA7 Global Tech will coordinate with our technical partners and provide a revised timeline or quotation.

items.question: What happens if I'm not satisfied with the service?
items.answer: IA7 Global Tech maintains open communication throughout the project. If issues arise, we will address them directly, and if necessary, work with external partners to resolve them.

impressum_page.subtitle: Legal Notice According to German Law (§5 TMG)

compliance.title: Legal Compliance
compliance.text: This Impressum complies with German legal requirements under §5 TMG (Telemediengesetz) and §55 RStV (Rundfunkstaatsvertrag). For any legal inquiries or concerns, please contact us at

content.1: These Terms and Conditions govern all contractual relationships between IA7 Global Tech (brand of IA7 Global Trading UG (haftungsbeschränkt), Germany) and its clients.
content.2: By engaging our services, the client agrees to these Terms and Conditions. Any conflicting terms proposed by the client are explicitly rejected unless confirmed in writing by IA7 Global Tech.
content.3: IA7 Global Tech acts as the exclusive contractual partner for all services. The technical execution of IT services is performed by subcontractors, including partners located outside the European Union (e.g., JGdeveloper, India).

content.1: IA7 Global Tech provides project management, coordination, and facilitation of IT solutions, including software development, technical support, and consulting.
content.2: All technical work, coding, and implementation are performed by external subcontractors. IA7 Global Tech is not a development company and does not execute technical services in-house.
content.3: The services include, but are not limited to:

list.3: Quality assurance and delivery of completed projects

content.1: The client must provide all required information, documents, and access in a timely manner.
content.2: Delays or missing information from the client may result in postponed delivery dates, without IA7 Global Tech being liable for such delays.
content.3: Clients must comply with all applicable laws in connection with the services.

content.1: Offers are non-binding unless explicitly stated otherwise.
content.2: Contracts are concluded only after written confirmation by IA7 Global Tech.
content.3: IA7 Global Tech reserves the right to refuse contracts without giving reasons.

content.1: Fees are specified in the respective quotation or service agreement.
content.2: Payments are due within 14 days of the invoice date unless otherwise agreed in writing.
content.3: Late payments incur interest of 5% above the base rate and IA7 Global Tech may suspend services until payment is received.
content.4: All fees are invoiced by IA7 Global Trading UG, regardless of subcontractors involved.

content.1: All intellectual property created by subcontractors in the course of the project is transferred to the client only after full payment.
content.2: IA7 Global Tech reserves the right to display anonymized work for marketing purposes.
content.3: Clients may not use IA7 Global Tech or subcontractor materials outside the agreed scope without written consent.

content.1: IA7 Global Tech acts solely as contractual coordinator. Liability for technical implementation lies primarily with subcontractors.
content.2: IA7 Global Tech's liability is limited to intentional misconduct and gross negligence. Liability for indirect damages, lost profits, or business interruption is excluded to the maximum extent permitted by law.
content.3: IA7 Global Tech is not liable for delays or failures caused by:

content.1: Personal data provided by the client will be processed in accordance with our Privacy Policy.
content.2: Client data may be transferred to subcontractors in India under GDPR-compliant safeguards (e.g., Standard Contractual Clauses).

content.1: All business information, project data, and technical specifications shared between client and IA7 Global Tech are confidential.
content.2: Confidentiality obligations continue for 5 years after the completion of services.

content.1: All contracts are governed by German law.
content.2: Exclusive jurisdiction for all disputes arising from these Terms and Conditions is the competent court in Berlin, Germany.

content.1: Amendments or additions to these Terms require written form.
content.2: Should individual provisions of these Terms be invalid, the validity of remaining provisions remains unaffected.

cancellation_page.subtitle: Cancellation and Termination Policy
cancellation_page.intro: This policy outlines the terms and conditions for service cancellation and contract termination between IA7 Global Tech and its clients. All cancellation terms are subject to written confirmation in the service agreement.

list.1: Pre-Project Cancellation: Clients may cancel services prior to project start without penalty.
list.2: Post-Commencement Cancellation: Once work has commenced, cancellation requires written notice. Fees may apply for work already completed.

2.title: 2. Contract Termination by IA7 Global Tech
2.intro: IA7 Global Tech reserves the right to terminate a contract under the following circumstances:

list.1: Non-Payment: Failure to make payments according to agreed terms and schedule.
list.2: Breach of Obligations: Client's failure to fulfill contractual obligations or provide required information and resources.
list.3: Force Majeure: Circumstances beyond reasonable control that prevent service delivery.

3.title: 3. Refunds

content.1: Non-Refundable Services: Fees paid for completed work or services already rendered are non-refundable.

3.notice: Important Notice: All refund requests will be evaluated on a case-by-case basis in accordance with the specific terms outlined in your service agreement.

confirmation.title: Written Confirmation Required
confirmation.text: All cancellation terms are subject to written confirmation in the service agreement. For any questions regarding cancellation or termination, please contact our team at
